page.title: 18OXSHOTT FAMILY INTERVIEW
page.content: Dr.G's family consists of himself, his wife and 2 children, Richard and Lynette. He is the director of the X-ray department at St. Anthony's Hospital, Cheam and also works at Leatherhead Cottage Hospital and Epsom Hospital. His wife is a distinguished accountant. {Weekend activities The family are members of Oxshott Tennis Club and play regularly. At other times, Mrs.G. might go shopping while her children practise music on the cello, clarinet or piano. Richard has a computer which he often uses and also a 'Walkman'.In the evenings the family sometimes goes to the theatre. In the colder weather they will go out for a walk, visit friends or entertain. Once a year they will go abroad for a European holiday.
